runs.comm: flighted into the pads, Sarfraz clips it to midwicket
pushed through on middle, Shehzad nudges it to mid-on on the edge of the circle and runs through

this is rather round-armish and quite quick as well. Sarfraz was going for a sweep, a favoured shot and is struck on the forearm. Bowler goes up for a leg-before appeal, but it might be a touch too high

this time the finger goes up! Maiden wicket for Devcich and Sarfraz fails. It was full and flat and beat Sarfraz for pace as he went for another sweep. Struck low enough on the pads, but with the angle in at the batsman, this seemed to hint at going down leg... Brownlie got a poor one in the NZ innings, and Sarfraz gets a worse one. HawkEye says it would have missed by a stump and a half!
flighted on off stump, pushed down to mid-off past the bowler's dive
a bit of width on offer and Shehzad runs it down to backward point
back of a length and outside off, Hafeez uses soft hands and blocks. Think that ball straightened too
tapped into the covers as Hafeez stays in line with a shortish ball on off stump
picked away off his hips and it bounces away to the fine leg boundary. Williamson played a similar stroke earlier, only Hafeez was waiting on the back foot. Clipped it away quite effortlessly
magnificent! A couple of steps down to turn a length ball into an overpitched delivery and he's carved it over the covers.
it's short and Hafeez completes the hat-trick with a pull to fine leg. Didn't get bat on it, but Pakistan will take the extras
fuller delivery outside off and Hafeez pushes it to mid-off
tickled around the corner and short fine leg and square leg both scurry after it
fired in on middle and leg, Shehzad works it through mdwicket

He's got another one! New Zealand are making a match out of this! Seemed an innocuous length ball on off stump, to which Hafeez got back to try and force through the off side. But it held on the pitch and with the batsman using hard hands, simply popped back into the hands of Devcich
nudged to short midwicket
has to dig out a yorker on off stump
shortish and a shade outside off, Sohail blocks towards mid-on
shortish on off stump, Shehzad rolls his wrists on top of the ball and sends it to deep square leg

stands up tall behind a shortish delivery outside off and drills it to cover. Lovely timing from Sohail, which is possibly why he wanted something out of it. Taylor's diving stop almost creates an opportunity with both batsmen lazily trekking down the pitch
shortish and tucking him up, Sohail works it away to midwicket
fuller delivery on off stump, pushed to mid-on.
leans into a rather correct-looking drive as he steps forward to a fuller delivery outside off and caresses to extra cover
keeps to his crease and pushes a back of a length delivery to mid-off for a single
fuller delivery outside off, Sohail uses the straight bat to find mid-off
goes for a cross-batted swipe, but the ball is a touch too full and he did not have the room he wanted. Mistimes to mid-on
good length ball on leg stump, kisses the pads of Shehzad while he was looking to flick. Ronchi does well as he dives to his left and manages to keep it to just a single

he was eyeing that leg side, he was getting anxious for quick runs and that pressure has got to him. Thinks he's got a length ball and tries to slog across the line. Only manages to get the toe of the bat and hand a simple catch to deep square leg
fuller delivery outside off, Shehzad drives to mid-off

straightens from off stump and beats a low-percentage push from Shehzad. There was no footwork and he was trying to compensate by reaching out to the ball with his hands. Beautiful delivery from Henry
fullish on off stump, carefully defended
opens the face and runs a good length ball into the covers with soft hands
stays beside the good length ball and slices it behind point with an open face
ventures down the track to a length ball, no real pace to worry the batsman. So Nasim winds up and creams it over long-on
beaten on the offcutter outside off. Nasim was trying to open the face and run it down to third man, but was unable to do so
another slower ball, and Nasim is unable to cash in with the open face again
tossed up on leg stump, tucked away to deep square leg
good length ball on off stump, Nasim waits on it and works it into the vacant midwicket region
fired in on off stump, Shehzad steals a single into the covers with a soft-handed push
flighted on off stump and Nasim plants the open face on it and picks up a single before point can get to it
pushed through from wide of the crease and Shehzad pushes forward to block a fuller delivery
defends outside the line of a fuller delivery on off stump and gets an inside edge towards midwicket

just a bit of room on offer and Shehzad makes it worse with some top-class footwork. Jumps back and outside leg to carve it behind point. Taylor needed to race across and dive full length to keep that to three
goes back and nudges a good length ball towards midwicket
pushed through on middle and off, Shehzad looks to jump across and tuck it through midwicket. Can't quite get enough behind the stroke
stays legside of the ball this time and nudges it through the covers
goes back and clips a good length ball through square leg
runs down the track to reach the pitch of the ball as he lifts him over extra cover. Didn't get all of it as long-off runs to his left to get behind it
lands the first one nicely as he keeps the batsman to a forward defensive on off stump
goes back to a length ball and clips into the vacant midwicket region, and Vettori has to chase it down himself
rolls his wrists on top of a good length ball and works it through square leg
tossed up and drifting in on middle, Nasim was looking to force it through the off side and gets an inside edge to long-on
very well controlled from Shehzad as he comes down the track and chips over cover. Top class footwork against spin
good length ball on off stump, kept out
flatter delivery outside off, Nasim bunts it down to long-on
backs away and slaps a shortish delivery outside off to deep point
bowls short and outside leg, Nasim's pull finds Neesham on the fine leg boundary. Sat up for a lot more than a single, that ball
nips down the track and pushes a flighted delivery down to long-off
Beautifully bowled as McCullum drifts a flatter delivery across the right-hander and beats him
Low full toss on off stump, which Nasim pushes to long-on
Uses his feet to reach the pitch of a full and flat delivery and clubs it down to long-on
Runs at Vettori, who refuses the batsman any room and Shehzad has to push to cover
Backs away and cuts a shortish deliver outside off to point
Goes back to a length ball, waits on it to reach him and taps it wide of long-on and has picked up a couple that was barely there
Flighted on middle and leg, clipped to deep midwicket
fired in on off stump and Nasim pushes down to long-off
promising start as Nasim plays inside the line of a short delivery that cuts away off the seam
strays too straight this time and Nasim finds a single to fine leg
moves outside leg to try and throw the bowler off, and once he had done so and the ball was full and outside off, Shehzad runs outside off and laps it over fine leg
picks out cover! Another seemingly innocuous delivery on off stump, inviting the drive. Nasim went for it and was trying to lift the ball over the infield but only ends up offering a simple catch
shortish and outside off, Akmal taps it down to third man to get off the mark
that's the slower ball outside off and Shehzad, who had advanced at the bowler, has to wait before slapping it through the covers
fired in on middle and off, Shehzad backs away and cuts behind point
tossed up outside off, Akmal blocks and finds the gap in the covers
powerful thump down the ground as he uses his feet to reach the pitch of a dart on off stump
slides in with a round-armed action and Akmal uses it to tuck behind square leg
runs at the bowler, who fires it flat and outside off. Shehzad chooses to go leg side and gets it off the bottom of the bat to long-on
pushed through on off stump and it is defended. Devcich ends his spell with 2 for 17 and the equation for Pakistan is 74 off 42
picks out long-off as he comes down the track to a fuller delivery outside off
turn, enough to scupper Akmal's cut shot. Hits a fuller length on middle which means the stroke was always an optimistic one
fired in and pushed across the right-hander who was looking to slice it towards third man. Good job he didn't overbalance because Ronchi has kept well
how has that missed! It was another slider and Akmal was looking to open the face and run it down to third man. Whistles past the off stump, barely
worked into the midwicket region
runs down the track, but McCullum pulls his length back and allows only a single of a heave to fine leg

another strike, and that rising run-rate has contributed to Shehzad's downfall. Opted for a huge slog sweep to a delivery that was too full and was sliding on. Once he missed there was one place it was heading
tossed up on middle and leg, Afridi goes for a flick and settles for a leg bye
tossed up on middle and leg, Akmal works it into the gap at midwicket and Vettori displays NZ's desperation for a win as he chases the ball down
runs down the track and hammers the ball into the crowd behind the cover boundary. Typical response from the Pakistan captain, and it was off a miscue
lobs up a full toss for Afridi, and it's over waist high, the umpire says. Afridi pulls to long-on
pushed through on off stump and it's been pushed to long-off
boom and here's another boom! That's 17 off the over with Afridi backing away and sending a fuller ball outside leg stump into orbit. Devcich was at long-on, and watches the ball sail over him
slower delivery on the pads, and it hits them as Akmal looks to lap sweep. Single before the keeper can catch up to it
low full toss on middle, Afridi pushes to long-on
change of pace beats Akmal as he set up for a cut outside off and played just a touch too early
dug in short and Akmal, who was moving away outside leg, reaches out and ramps it over point. Did quite well to connect with that
middle stump has been knocked off it's perch! Fires in a fast, fuller delivery - a cross-seamer - that Akmal opted to run at and cream away through the covers. He misses and Neesham hits
good length ball outside off, Anwar pushes into the covers and picks up a single
back of a length and outside off, Anwar runs it down to deep third man
That's about the worst ball to bowl to this field. Lobs up a low full toss outside off and it's been lapped over the fine leg fielder
banged in short and Afridi has hammered it to mid-off, who is deep enough for a single
beaten off the slower ball, Anwar was setting up for the huge hoick over long-on. Not the shot he needs to attempt with Afridi at the other end

lifts it straight up, and he's been caught by Williamson. What a stunner! Another slower ball has brought about a useful strike, but this was all the captain's doing. He raced back from mid-off, threw his hands over his head and safely held it with a reverse cup
width on offer and Afridi has smashed it over the covers
length on off stump and Tanvir capitalises. A powerful blow down the ground as he relished the room on offer
slower ball goes wrong as he slants it too far wide outside off
full and wide outside off, Tanvir carts it down to long-on to return the strike to Afridi
shortish on off stump, Afridi almost swings himself off his feet with a pull, which has been mistimed to deep square leg
another wide from Neesham, and it's another offcutter gone wrong. Willliamson comes up to try and calm his bowler down
tries to get the ball out of reach of Tanvir, that seems to be a deliberate ploy. The full and wide of off stump delivery is tapped to long-off
slower ball on middle, Afridi loves those as he plants his front leg and carts it over deep square leg to make it 15 off the over. The over Pakistan wanted

banged in short as Afridi goes for a pull and there is a nick! Afridi is bemused, actually he's confused. He can't believe he's out. But there was a feather edge. Brilliant short ball from Neesham as he gets it to skid off the deck and rise too far for Afridi to control his shot.
dropped at long-on. Nathan McCullum was racing in to try and get under the flat strike from Tanvir. Got there, dives forward but isn't able to hold on.
goes shortish on and around off stump, Gul tries to pull from his crease and is beaten
he's picked up a short of a length ball and launched it.... straight down the throat of deep midwicket. New Zealand are pulling off another stunning fighback in the UAE
good length ball slides down leg and Tanvir can't reach it with a swipe
lengt hball on middle, the Tanvir swipe makes another appearance and it has enough legs to beat a dive from short fine leg on his right. Timely boundary

that's shot straight up in the air, and it's that man Devcich who gets under it! New Zealand have levelled the series with a very cleverly executing bowling performance. It was back of a length and outside off to tempt a swat from Tanvir, and his bat face turns on impact to sky a catch to long-off
